attributes.action: supply HM Forces in Afghanistan with such equipment and manpower as THEY ask for and without delay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Afghanistan the Army is critically short of manpower as well as various important equipment including transport helicoptors.  The shortage of the latter is seriously prejudicial to the safety of personnel evidinced by the number of deaths and injuries of service men and women particularly from roadside explosive devices.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
